title: Petrified Forest National Park: Cultural Demonstrations
body: Cultural Demonstrations         Apache Crown Dancers NPS  The Cultural Demonstrator Program at Petrified Forest National Park provides the opportunity for local artisans to share their history and traditional crafts with park visitors. Demonstrations throughout the year at Painted Desert Inn National Historic Landmark. The park is pleased to promote awareness and appreciation for the history and diverse cultures of the region. The demonstrators help connect us to ancient peoples, intertribal relationships, European-descent cultures, and even Route 66 history. This program is run by Petrified Forest Museum Association. Go here to check out their calendar. You can also call 928-524-6228 x239
